item.title: DeepSeek Core Readings
item.author: 152334H
item.description:
These are a set of personal notes about the deepseek core readings (extended).

They are not meant for mass public consumption (though you are free to read/cite), as I will only be noting down information that I care about.

item.title: DeepSeek Core Readings 1 - LLM
item.author: 152334H
item.description: Paper summary: LLaMA-like 7B/67B pretrain (Base) + SFT&DPO (Chat). 2T tokens with strong CN/EN mix, >1mil SFT examples. Well-executed exploration of scaling laws. Good details about evals and safety. Not much described about their actual data.

item.title: The making of: Disco Narrator
item.author: 152334H
item.description: How I made a Text-to-Speech (TTS) model for (some of) a video game’s characters.
